item.title: OpenAI CEO Calls for Collaboration With China to Counter AI Risks
item.description: As the U.S. seeks to contain China’s progress in artificial intelligence though sanctions, OpenAI CEO Sam Altman is choosing engagement.

item.title: Four children, including a baby, were found alive in the Amazon jungle nearly six weeks after they survived the crash of a small plane and wandered into the wilderness, Colombia's president said.
item.description: Four children, including a baby, were found alive in the Amazon jungle nearly six weeks after they survived the crash of a small plane and wandered into the wilderness, Colombia’s president said.

item.title: The Moral Hazards of Being Beautiful
item.description: Research shows that attractive people tend to receive unearned esteem from others and cultivate self-serving beliefs.

item.title: The True Stars of Peak TV Are Caught in the Middle
Can Twitter's Odd Couple Make It Work? Elon Musk and His New CEO Are About to Find Out
item.description: Musk announced her arrival before she had a contract. They haven’t formally agreed on a budget or headcount. And Linda Yaccarino hasn’t even gotten to the hard part yet.

item.title: German investigators are examining evidence that suggests a sabotage team used Poland as an operating base to blow up the Nord Stream pipelines built to transport Russian gas through the Baltic Sea.
item.description: German investigators are examining evidence that suggests a sabotage team used Poland as an operating base to blow up the Nord Stream pipelines built to transport Russian gas through the Baltic Sea.

item.title: Federal prosecutors unsealed a sweeping 49-page indictment against Trump alleging the former president held on to sensitive military secrets he knew he shouldn't have retained access to, shared them with others and directed his staff to help him evade authorities' efforts to get them back.
item.description: Federal prosecutors unsealed a sweeping 49-page indictment against Trump alleging the former president held on to sensitive military secrets he knew he shouldn’t have retained access to, shared them with others and directed his staff to help him evade authorities’ efforts to get them back.

item.title: Former U.K. leader Boris Johnson said he would step down as a lawmaker following a probe into whether he lied to Parliament about his attendance at a series of parties during Covid lockdowns.
item.description: Former U.K. leader Boris Johnson said he would step down as a lawmaker following a probe into whether he lied to Parliament about his attendance at a series of parties during Covid lockdowns.

item.title: Ukrainian forces were probing Russian defenses as Kyiv searched for weak points that could allow it to break through Russian lines and retake occupied territory as part of its long-anticipated counteroffensive.
item.description: Ukrainian forces were probing Russian defenses as Kyiv searched for weak points that could allow it to break through Russian lines and retake occupied territory as part of its long-anticipated counteroffensive.

item.title: What's News: World-Wide
The Case for Banning TikTok and Other Socials for Kids Under 16
item.description: Doctors and policy makers say that 13 is too young for social media. Science suggests waiting would be better.

item.title: Trump Faces 2024 Split Screen of Campaign, Criminal Trials
item.description: The former president’s indictment ensures his legal woes will be front and center through the GOP primaries and next year’s general election.

item.title: Nord Stream Sabotage Probe Turns to Clues Inside Poland
item.description: German investigators suspect the Nord Stream pipeline saboteurs used the NATO ally’s territory as an operations base for the attack.

item.title: Erdogan appointed former First Republic Bank executive Hafize Gaye Erkan to lead Turkey's central bank, in a likely shift away from the unorthodox economic policies that have sown economic instability.
item.description: Erdogan appointed former First Republic Bank executive Hafize Gaye Erkan to lead Turkey’s central bank, in a likely shift away from the unorthodox economic policies that have sown economic instability.

item.title: A judge rejected 3M's use of chapter 11 to resolve a mass tort case, dismissing a "fatally premature" bankruptcy case filed by its military earplug manufacturing unit.
item.description: A judge rejected 3M’s use of chapter 11 to resolve a mass tort case, dismissing a “fatally premature” bankruptcy case filed by its military earplug manufacturing unit.

item.title: U.S. stocks rose in muted trading on Friday, with the S&P 500, Dow industrials and Nasdaq notching weekly gains of 0.4%, 0.3% and 0.1%, respectively.
item.description: U.S. stocks rose in muted trading on Friday, with the S&P 500, Dow industrials and Nasdaq notching weekly gains of 0.4%, 0.3% and 0.1%, respectively.

item.title: Pharmaceutical industry giantscompleted a deal to pay $19 billion to states that accused them of fueling the opioid crisis, infusing more money into communities still struggling with how to address the scourge of drug use.
item.description: Pharmaceutical industry giants completed a deal to pay $19 billion to states that accused them of fueling the opioid crisis, infusing more money into communities still struggling with how to address the scourge of drug use.

item.title: The U.S. Chamber of Commerce is spearheadinganew front in the pharmaceutical industry's efforts to undo the U.S. government'spowers to negotiate drug prices.
item.description: The U.S. Chamber of Commerce is spearheading a new front in the pharmaceutical industry’s efforts to undo the U.S. government’s powers to negotiate drug prices.

item.title: Netflix's crackdown on password-sharing in the U.S. delivered a windfall of new subscribers in its earliest days, according to new data from streaming analytics company Antenna.
item.description: Netflix’s crackdown on password-sharing in the U.S. delivered a windfall of new subscribers in its earliest days, according to new data from streaming analytics company Antenna.

item.title: What's News: Business & Finance
